metadata.description: Paul Barry's obsession with the ocean took a turn when his crew's vessel was lost in a deep sea descent missionwith his crew inside. Fifty-five years later, with the recovery of the ship, Paul is about to discover the horrific mysteries of time and the abyss. From the pages of _Dark Horse Presents_. * By acclaimed writers Jimmy Palmiotti and Justin Gray (_Creator-Owned Heroes, Jonah Hex_). * From _Wonder Woman_ artist Tony Akins!
metadata.name: The Deep Sea
